name: Breaking Bad
description: A high school chemistry teacher turned meth maker partners with a former student to secure his family's future.

name: El Camino
description: In the wake of his dramatic escape from captivity, Jesse must come to terms with his past in order to forge some kind of future.

name: Better Call Saul
description: The series follows Jimmy McGill, the character who becomes Saul Goodman in breaking bad.

episodes.title: Duo
episodes.description: Jimmy works his magic in the courtroom. Unexpected inspiration leads him to an unconventional pursuit of potential clients.

episodes.title: Mijo
episodes.description: Jimmy seizes an opportunity to reconnect with an old friend. Chuck adjusts to a new way of life.

episodes.title: Nacho
episodes.description: Jimmy pulls out all the stops to prove that his dangerous client is innocent, even though it causes some friction with Kim.

episodes.title: Hero
episodes.description: Jimmy conjures up a bold plan to solicit new clients, but has to face the consequences when the scheme strains his relationship with a rival firm.

episodes.title: Alpine Shepherd Boy
episodes.description: When his efforts to drum up new business are interrupted by alarming news, Jimmy is pressured to make a difficult choice.

episodes.title: Five-O
episodes.description: Mike's tragic past comes back to haunt him, and he's forced to seek help from an unusual source. Meanwhile, Jimmy's moral compass is put to the test.

episodes.title: Bingo
episodes.description: Jimmy meets with potential new clients. Then, when given the opportunity to do the right thing, he cashes in a favor from an unlikely ally.

episodes.title: Rico
episodes.description: Jimmy shows Chuck that he's willing to do almost anything to win a case, even if it means getting his hands dirty.

episodes.title: Pimento
episodes.description: Chuck wants to transfer the Sandpiper case to HHM, but Jimmy's decision to take the case to a law firm known for fraud cases leaves Chuck appalled.

episodes.title: Marco
episodes.description: Jimmy seizes the opportunity to reconnect with an old friend. Chuck adjusts to a new way of life.

episodes.title: Switch
episodes.description: Jimmy and Kim's relationship takes a new turn. Mike decides it's for the best to sever his affiliation with an unrestrained associate.

episodes.title: Cobbler
episodes.description: Jimmy's actions unexpectedly create waves for Kim. Mike cautiously weighs a lucrative proposal that might bring about dire consequences.

episodes.title: Amarillo
episodes.description: Jimmy's client outreach efforts thrive, and he exhibits new heights of showmanship. Mike is perplexed by daughter-in-law Stacey's troubling news.

episodes.title: Gloves Off
episodes.description: Jimmy's actions unexpectedly create waves for Kim. Mike cautiously weighs a lucrative proposal that might bring about dire consequences.

episodes.title: Rebecca
episodes.description: Jimmy becomes frustrated with his restrictive work environment. Kim pulls out all the stops to dig herself out of a seemingly bottomless hole at HHM.

episodes.title: Bali Ha'i
episodes.description: Jimmy finds comfort in a familiar place. Kim receives a life-changing proposal. Mike is pushed to the limit when what he holds dearest is threatened.

episodes.title: Inflatable
episodes.description: Jimmy meets with potential new clients. Then, when given the opportunity to do the right thing, he cashes in a favor from an unlikely ally.

episodes.title: Fifi
episodes.description: Mike's growing frustration shows when his hand is forced, but with Jimmy's help, he works to keep the peace. Meanwhile, Jimmy boldly forges a new path forward.

episodes.title: Nailed
episodes.description: Mike takes a methodical approach to his mission. Someone questions Chuck's capabilities. Jimmy faces a personal dilemma.

episodes.title: Klick
episodes.description: Jimmy is forced to make a hard choice. Mike takes matters into his own hands. Hamlin relays shocking news while Chuck's condition continues to evolve.

name: Cyberpunk Edgerunners
description: A Street Kid trying to survive in a technology and body modification-obsessed city of the future. Having everything to lose, he chooses to stay alive by becoming an Edgerunner, a Mercenary outlaw also known as a Cyberpunk.

episodes.title: Let You Down
episodes.description: After a night of streaming illegal braindance, David wakes up to reality: a rundown apartment with a broken washing machine and an overworked mother.

episodes.title: Like A Boy
episodes.description: With his newly enhanced body, David heads to the Academy seeking revenge on his bully. Later, he meets a mysterious woman who wants to recruit him.

episodes.title: Smooth Criminal
episodes.description: Surrounded by a group of rowdy edgerunners, David makes a plea to join their team. Meanwhile, sinister forces plot to lure him back to Arasaka Academy.

episodes.title: Lucky You
episodes.description: Eager to learn the edgerunner ropes, David pesters Maine for another mission. Instead, Maine tasks Lucy with training him.

episodes.title: All Eyez On Me
episodes.description: David makes a clever suggestion when the team strategizes for their next mission. However, he soon learns that their target can't be underestimated.

episodes.title: Girl on Fire
episodes.description: Maine doesn’t seem to be himself. But the team has bigger fish to fry: They must race against time to extract vital information from their prisoner.

episodes.title: Stronger
episodes.description: Now an all-star edgerunner enhanced with more cybernetics, David leads his team into a new mission. An old contact reaches out to him for a big job.

episodes.title: Stay
episodes.description: Faraday finds himself stuck between Arasaka and Militech. Lucy and Rebecca confront David about his change in behavior, but he refuses to listen.

episodes.title: Humanity
episodes.description: Lucy’s captors learn about her secret mission and dark past. David and his team head out to complete Faraday’s job but realize that something is off.

episodes.title: My Moon My Man
episodes.description: On the edge of cyberpsychosis but determined to save Lucy, David storms into Night City as Arasaka plots to deploy their ultimate lethal weapon.

name: Invincible
description: Mark Grayson is a normal teenager, except for the fact that his father is the most powerful superhero on the planet. Shortly after his seventeenth birthday, Mark begins to develop powers of his own and enters into his father's tutelage.

episodes.title: IT’S ABOUT TIME
episodes.description: When Mark Grayson finally inherits powers from his superhero father, it’s a dream come true. But there’s more to being a hero than just choosing a name and costume.

episodes.title: HERE GOES NOTHING
episodes.description: With his father out of action, Mark struggles to defend the city against an interdimensional invasion, joining forces with a team of teenage superheroes.

episodes.title: WHO YOU CALLING UGLY?
episodes.description: Mark has to cut a study date short to help save Mount Rushmore from a crazed scientist. Robot deals with drama as he assembles a new team of world-saving superheroes.

episodes.title: NEIL ARMSTRONG, EAT YOUR HEART OUT
episodes.description: It’s two firsts for Mark: a first date and a first trip to another planet. At the same time, Nolan and Debbie revisit their own first vacation together.

episodes.title: THAT ACTUALLY HURT
episodes.description: Feeling confident in his new abilities, Mark risks a team-up with a local villain to take down a crime lord, while simultaneously juggling school and a new relationship.

episodes.title: YOU LOOK KINDA DEAD
episodes.description: Mark joins William and Amber on a campus visit to Upstate University, hoping to discover a new future for himself. Debbie makes her own disturbing discovery.

episodes.title: WE NEED TO TALK
episodes.description: Feeling lost and confused, Mark looks for advice from Eve. At the same time, everyone’s looking for him.

episodes.title: WHERE I REALLY COME FROM
episodes.description: Mark must prove he’s become the hero he’s always wanted to be by stopping an unstoppable force.
